books.author: by Mark Owen with Kevin Maurer
books.description: An account by a former member of the Navy SEALs, written pseudonymously, of the mission that killed Osama bin Laden.
books.name: NO EASY DAY

books.author: by Bob Woodward
books.description: Inside the debt-ceiling negotations of 2011 with the Washington Post journalist.
books.name: THE PRICE OF POLITICS

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The anchor of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: KILLING LINCOLN

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Edward Klein
books.description: A journalist argues that President Obama is callow, arrogant and unable to lead.
books.name: AMATEUR

books.author: by Dinesh D'Souza
books.description: An argument that President Obama is the architect of American decline.
books.name: OBAMA'S AMERICA

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Christopher Hitchens
books.description: Reports and reflections on his illness and impending death by the writer, who died in December 2011.
books.name: MORTALITY

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS

books.author: by Paul Tough
books.description: An argument that the qualities that matter most have to do with character, not intelligence.
books.name: HOW CHILDREN SUCCEED

books.author: by Kurt Eichenwald
books.description: A global account of the 18 months after 9/11, with emphasis on the Bush administration’s panicked response.
books.name: 500 DAYS

books.author: by Tyler Hamilton and Daniel Coyle
books.description: An account of the world of professional cycling and its doping issues, focused on the Tour de France, by an Olympic gold medalist.
books.name: THE SECRET RACE

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A member of the Navy SEALs discusses his battlefield experiences.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by Charles Duhigg
books.description: A Times reporter’s account of the science behind how we form, and break, habits.
books.name: THE POWER OF HABIT

books.author: by Robert D. Kaplan
books.description: Predicting the next cycle of conflict on the basis of temperature and topography.
books.name: REVENGE OF GEOGRAPHY
